function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close contact during temperature screening process","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading infection to the person conducting screening","Mitigation":"Use of non-contact thermal imaging technology for temperature screening","Technologies":"Thermal imaging technology","People":"Person conducting the screening, general public","Owner":"Health organizations, screening authorities"},{"Description":"Slow temperature screening process","Impact":"Long wait times and potential for missed infected individuals","Mitigation":"Implementation of high-speed thermal scanning technology","Technologies":"High-speed thermal scanning technology","People":"General public, individuals being screened","Owner":"Health organizations, screening authorities"},{"Description":"Dependence on lighting conditions for temperature measurement","Impact":"Limitations in dark or poorly lit environments","Mitigation":"Utilize thermal imaging technology that does not depend on lighting conditions","Technologies":"Thermal imaging technology","People":"General public, individuals being screened","Owner":"Health organizations, screening authorities"}]}
